# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position (x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) 
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of the following entity:
- Stone furnace (position x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner equipment without fuel
- Ensure that burner equipment has fuel before using it.
### Errors when using furnaces without ingredients
- Ensure that furnaces have the necessary ingredients before using them.
### Errors when using steam engines without connection
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the power grid before using them.
### Errors when using inserter without source items
- Ensure that inserters have source items before using them.
### Errors when using pipe groups without fluid
- Ensure that pipe groups have fluid before using them.
### Errors when using belt groups without items
- Ensure that belt groups have items before using them.
### Errors when using electricity groups without connection to electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are connected to the electric network before using them.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned.
